publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-461.1 Mr John Swinney: Executive's Proposals as set out in the Framework Document on Wider Access to Further and Higher Education—As an amendment to motion (S1M-461) in the name of Henry McLeish, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "resolves that the principle of free access to higher education must be restored; calls upon the Scottish Executive to abolish tuition fees for all Scottish students at UK universities and opposes the proposals for a Scottish Graduate Endowment as tuition fees by another name, and demands the implementation in full of the other recommendations of the Independent Inquiry into Student Finance." Supported by: Colin Campbell*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Michael Russell*
